name: Dash Through Hardest Geometry World
description:
Welcome to this mind bent puzzle platformer. It is targeted to challenge the teenagers as well as players of all ages to train they reflexes and timing skills.

Guide the ball through different levels and avoiding various barriers and difficulties. It comes out to be simple and easy but it’s actually very tricky and challenging.

Figure out this brainteaser that will baffle your mind all way though this mysterious journey

How to play:
• Tap left to move left
• Tap right to move right

Download now. It’s quite amazing.
